description: Configures whether participant accounts in your organization can create Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP Multi-AZ file systems in subnets that are shared by a virtual private cloud (VPC) owner. For more information, see the Amazon FSx for NetApp ONTAP User Guide.

parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: (Optional) An idempotency token for resource creation, in a string of up to 63 ASCII characters. This token is automatically filled on your behalf when you use the Command Line Interface (CLI) or an Amazon Web Services SDK. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: EnableFsxRouteTableUpdatesFromParticipantAccounts
nested_items.description: Indicates whether participant accounts can create FSx for ONTAP Multi-AZ file systems in shared subnets.
